item.title: Acid Frogs
item.media:title: Acid Frogs
item.media:description:
It took nearly a year for me to finish this
but I like how it turned out
and I think that this is one of my best works.

I want to thank two peopel,
first Feyrah [link]
I changed this picture at least 3 times complet, after the second version I just didn't know how to go on but a friend showed me a comic from Feyrah [link]
I like the colors of the tree and decided that I wanted one in my picture.
It worked I had finally some structure in the compasition and was abel to build on that base.

I also want to thank Daniel Lieske the amazing artist behind the web comic Worm World Saga
(The second Chapter is out ).
[link]
His tutorials on You Tube are really good and where a great help for me.

So now go and check the work of this peopel out.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update: Look what I found in my scraps
[link]
the last picture is the one that turned into Acid Frogs

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update: ok I promise this is the final version.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update: There goes my promise.....but tis time it is really final .... wait I forgot to ad a shadow behind the frog... no this has to stop but I like how it changed you can see the old version in my scraps
[link]

the last picture is the one that turned into Acid Frogs

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update: ok I promise this is the final version.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update: There goes my promise.....but tis time it is really final .... wait I forgot to ad a shadow behind the frog... no this has to stop but I like how it changed you can see the old version in my scraps
[link]

item.title: SAVE THE FROGS.:
item.media:title: SAVE THE FROGS.:
item.media:description:
Pollution, global warming and habitat destruction from human development have already taken a serious toll. Frogs, in particular, have suffered, having lost an estimated 170 species in the last 10 years alone, with another 1,900 in a threatened state, which is one step below the endangered designation (meaning extinction is imminent). But only part of the destruction is man-made. A fungus identified in the last decade seems to be speeding up the death of the worldwide frog population exponentially. The chytrid fungus coats the frog's skin and makes its pores non-functional. Because a frog relies on its porous skin for hydration and for some of its respiration, the fungus essentially cuts off its water supply and makes it difficult to breathe. In the end, the frog dies from dehydration. (*Information from [link] )

This is for a contest, but also to just put it out there about the imminent extinction of our frogs.

ENJOY!
item.description:
Pollution, global warming and habitat destruction from human development have already taken a serious toll. Frogs, in particular, have suffered, having lost an estimated 170 species in the last 10 years alone, with another 1,900 in a threatened state, which is one step below the endangered designation (meaning extinction is imminent). But only part of the destruction is man-made. A fungus identified in the last decade seems to be speeding up the death of the worldwide frog population exponentially. The chytrid fungus coats the frog's skin and makes its pores non-functional. Because a frog relies on its porous skin for hydration and for some of its respiration, the fungus essentially cuts off its water supply and makes it difficult to breathe. In the end, the frog dies from dehydration. (*Information from [link] )

This is for a contest, but also to just put it out there about the imminent extinction of our frogs.

ENJOY!

item.title: Story telling- Raining frogs
item.media:title: Story telling- Raining frogs
item.media:description:
Part of my homework assignment for my Conceptual Story telling class.

"Outside I hear storm clouds gather for the first time in weeks, followed by heavy plopping sounds, and the noise of over a thousand frogs croaking and landing on the roof."

The teacher said i need to add more of a different color to make the main focus the frog on the skull instead of the huge light coming from the clouds ... but im too lazy XD. So meh.

It was due today, but i feel asleep yesterday and woke up around 4am Flailing that i didn't finish my picture XD so i did this all this morning from 4am to around 6:30 am i believe.

Sorry i haven't been uploading stuff :<
I'll try to have a few more things put up soon.

Schools been a real pain in the arse DX

item.title: Twilight in Glo-frog City
item.media:title: Twilight in Glo-frog City
item.media:description:
The first piece of 2009!
This was supposed to be a quick little assignment, but it got a little ambitious. It's for my Wintersession class, Monster (we talk about monsters): We were assigned to do a piece about Beauty vs. Revulsion...I went off on a "glowing frogs in cages would be neat" tangent, and here we are. Aren't glowing frogs-in-birdcages neat?
That's the thing about being an artist under a deadline...even your most delirious whims can be transformed into sleepless hours of wrist-ache
It's really a pretty slapped-together effort...for what it is, I'm very pleased with it. But now I am in need of some sleep. It's good to get a little work done again; I've been feeling very unproductive lately! Hopefully this will help shake me out of vacation.
For now, I really hope you enjoy it! Hopefully there will be plenty more work to come this new year.

As usual, very soon there will be more info, sketches, and chatter at my blog: [link]
item.description:

This was supposed to be a quick little assignment, but it got a little ambitious. It's for my Wintersession class, Monster (we talk about monsters): We were assigned to do a piece about Beauty vs. Revulsion...I went off on a "glowing frogs in cages would be neat" tangent, and here we are. Aren't glowing frogs-in-birdcages neat?
That's the thing about being an artist under a deadline...even your most delirious whims can be transformed into sleepless hours of wrist-ache
It's really a pretty slapped-together effort...for what it is, I'm very pleased with it. But now I am in need of some sleep. It's good to get a little work done again; I've been feeling very unproductive lately! Hopefully this will help shake me out of vacation.
For now, I really hope you enjoy it! Hopefully there will be plenty more work to come this new year.

As usual, very soon there will be more info, sketches, and chatter at my blog: [link]

item.title: Fruit Frogs
item.media:title: Fruit Frogs
item.media:description:
My school\'s illustration club held a challenge to create a piece based on the word \'sweet\'. I decided to use this as a springboard to get back into digital painting. This one ended up a little stiff, but it was fun and quick.

Photoshop and Corel Painter

item.title: Frogs??
item.media:title: Frogs??
item.media:description:
Yup...as random as that seems I've drawn Costa Rican Tree Frogs. My Spanish teacher learned of my art and asked if I would draw her tiny tree frogs.
"Uhhh yeah...sure."
Kind of random but I figured I might as well post them. Never drawn frogs before...kinda different. And she wanted them so small that I couldn't do much detail but eh...

Which is your favorite?? I like the second one! (The one that's climbing and only has half his legs...yeah...that one.)
item.description:

item.title: Poison Orchid Frog
item.media:title: Poison Orchid Frog
item.media:description:
A frog like creature with a mimic of an orchid flower that has evolved on the end of its tail.

They uses the sweet smelling flower to entice insects.

Orchid frogs are highly toxic, but if handled carefully they make fabulous pets

item.title: A Poem of Frogs
item.media:title: A Poem of Frogs
item.media:description:
I have been working on illustrating a book with and as well as others. The book is a calibration of our artwork illustrating a collection of poems written by E. Travis Gray

This one was a lot of fun to create! It was nice to bring out my comedic side. I really wanted it to feel like a story book. Enjoy!

Image & Poem (c) E. Travis Gray
Image created by Heather R Hitchman

*PLEASE DO NOT CRIT, THIS IS CLIENT WORK

item.title: Chameleon and Frog
item.media:title: Chameleon and Frog
item.media:description:
Commission 5/5 for of a Chameleon and a Frog.

This is hands down my favorite picture I have done to date It's nice to do something bright and colorful.
The Chameleon is really several varieties of chameleon combined, as well as the Frog (Green tree frog body with several dart frog color combinations)

Thank you for the challenge, ~Key2Immortality! <3

~~~~~~~~~~
Art by Kellie Lamphere (KLamphere - Plaguedog)
item.description:

item.title: If Frogs were Flowers...
item.media:title: If Frogs were Flowers...
item.media:description:
... then they would have some stuff in common with the mygra race ;D

Myrf is not your average mad scientist.

After leaving his home on Mygrash, (a planet of water and cities built on huge lilypads), on his parents' rickety starship, Myrf has subsequently enrolled into several both legal and illicit biotechnology and pharmacy companies trying to fullfil his dreams of science. But over years he has been constantly failing to ever step up from the level of lab assistant.

Not because he sucks at science. Merely because he sees exactly the mistakes in all the renowned formulas and always tells it to all the wrong people, who after hearing that consider him either potentially dangerous to their own scientific careers or batshit crazy.

Which he actually is, which he very well realizes XD. Even though despite peculiar way of saying things, twitching eyes, outbursts of giggles in all the wrong moments and weird behaviour in general, he is most adorable creature.

Why there are tentacles in the picture you can find out under the other picture with him, yes the one where he almost looks like Elvis XDDDD

And why there is flower in the picture... it's quite a naughty innuendo only chosen ones know about 8P

out of the funny details, Myrf has frog-fingers, never-closing eyes with transparent horizontal eyelids (which come in handy when he swims (he can spend a long time under water) but are an annoyance when he wants to sometimes stop seeing something, soft fluffy quite shape-able hair, and the funny things on his head are leaves that annoyingly tend to fall on his face when he hasn't gotten enough sunglight the previous day, which makes his favourite pastime that is working late with his crazy experiments quite impossible unless he's got a really powerful lamp over his head XDDD

yeah, i know nobody except like 2 people read this epic description XDDD sorry.

Myrf (c) me, he's from mine and *Zlukaka's epic sci fi roleplay that you can read (just ask) if you're not scared of ghey aliens ;DDDDD

Some more pictures of him here: [link] , [link] , [link]

---

comment plz! <:3

item.title: Frog and Colorado
item.media:title: Frog and Colorado
item.media:description:
Froggeh!

I've had this picture sitting half finished for months and months and I finally finished it the other day! woo! It's nice to be able to just stop everything for a couple hours and work on a picture of your own characters.

Anyway! I haven't introduced Colorado before! He is another character from Frog's story. I've just been too overwhelmed to get to do a proper character sheet for him. That and I was being super nitpicky about his design.

I really hope that someday I'll get to start posting this story for you all. I can barely handle the one comic with my schedule though

Speaking of which! I will attempt to post the next page tonight or tomorrow!

Thank you for taking a look!
item.description:
Froggeh!

I've had this picture sitting half finished for months and months and I finally finished it the other day! woo! It's nice to be able to just stop everything for a couple hours and work on a picture of your own characters.

Anyway! I haven't introduced Colorado before! He is another character from Frog's story. I've just been too overwhelmed to get to do a proper character sheet for him. That and I was being super nitpicky about his design.

I really hope that someday I'll get to start posting this story for you all. I can barely handle the one comic with my schedule though

Speaking of which! I will attempt to post the next page tonight or tomorrow!

Thank you for taking a look!

item.title: Little Frogs
item.media:title: Little Frogs
item.media:description: The Mister and I love The Princess and the Frog, but he has a great loathing of frogs. So one day I told him to draw us as frogs, and then I colored them. Hence the look of disgust on his face at his slimeyness (It is not slime! It is mucus!).
item.description: The Mister and I love The Princess and the Frog, but he has a great loathing of frogs. So one day I told him to draw us as frogs, and then I colored them. Hence the look of disgust on his face at his slimeyness (It is not slime! It is mucus!).

item.title: Leap Frog
item.media:title: Leap Frog
item.media:description:
Trade with

Well, this fella needs no introduction! He is, of course, Frog - Kellie's über-hawt stallion OC. What a pleasure he was to colour! I love his colours and markings. And his mane and tail were so much fun!

I'm not so keen on the shading - it's not as detailed as I'd like, but I just have so much to do that I had to leave it as it is. Sorry if it looks half-assed! Hope you like it, Kel. Thanks for looking, everyone!

Image © *boribaby (Michelle Walker '08)
Frog © *Plaguedog

Credits

Drawn with pencil
Lineart and colouring done with Photoshop CS2
Clouds referenced from Spirit
Pose referenced from: [link] by ~leethaxoor (But flipped, obviously!)
item.description:
Trade with

Well, this fella needs no introduction! He is, of course, Frog - Kellie's über-hawt stallion OC. What a pleasure he was to colour! I love his colours and markings. And his mane and tail were so much fun!

I'm not so keen on the shading - it's not as detailed as I'd like, but I just have so much to do that I had to leave it as it is. Sorry if it looks half-assed! Hope you like it, Kel. Thanks for looking, everyone!

Image © *boribaby (Michelle Walker '08)
Frog © *Plaguedog

Credits

Drawn with pencil
Lineart and colouring done with Photoshop CS2
Clouds referenced from Spirit
Pose referenced from: [link] by ~leethaxoor (But flipped, obviously!)

item.title: DF Frogs
item.media:title: DF Frogs
item.media:description:
F.R.O.G.
Frontline Recon Operation GYN

a high performance recon and light battle unit created to be the invisble hand of dragon fleet to suffocate the cancer that consume many worlds... the terrorists the guerrilla and rebels all the scum that are turing many worlds in to warzones will have no place to hide... the deadly FROGs will find them and give them what they deserve...

orginal by ~IgorKutuzov

item.title: AoH: The Frogs of Roseus
item.media:title: AoH: The Frogs of Roseus
item.media:description:
.......... are very unfortunate. =A=

*laughs at her own sense of lame humor*

It's not fun being a frog in Roseus. =A= You get killed rather easily... And brutally.

Ren's frog was murdered nosrsly
Fell's frog was squooshed by a rogue floor cleaning machine
Lea's frog is probably next


kidding. ._.

Ren belongs to (me)
Fell belongs to
Lea belongs to

And to each, their own frog .

item.title: frog princess
item.media:title: frog princess
item.media:description:
story: The crown princess was celebrating her birthday, she was riding on a stallion given by one of her many suitors hoping for her hand in marriage. She came across an old woman begging for a ride to the next town, saying that her old bones were tired. The princess wouldn't hear of it and pushed the old woman out of the way. The princess was about to ride off when the old woman waved her hand and the princess fell from the stallion.
The old woman revealed herself to a witch, the witch told the princess that if she had given her a ride, she would have blessed the princess with good luck for the rest of her life! The witch being angry then cast a spell on the princess transforming her into a frog princess, the witch then had the princess hop into a pond to live with the other frogs and living creatures.
Commissioned by Phil again
item.description:
story: The crown princess was celebrating her birthday, she was riding on a stallion given by one of her many suitors hoping for her hand in marriage. She came across an old woman begging for a ride to the next town, saying that her old bones were tired. The princess wouldn't hear of it and pushed the old woman out of the way. The princess was about to ride off when the old woman waved her hand and the princess fell from the stallion.
The old woman revealed herself to a witch, the witch told the princess that if she had given her a ride, she would have blessed the princess with good luck for the rest of her life! The witch being angry then cast a spell on the princess transforming her into a frog princess, the witch then had the princess hop into a pond to live with the other frogs and living creatures.
Commissioned by Phil again

item.title: Commi: Like a lotus petal...
item.media:title: Commi: Like a lotus petal...
item.media:description:
...I'll float along with you...

I remember reading the description and seeing the refs for this and thinking "Ooooooooh. Oooh!" My retinas burn now I have to tell you, haha! But it was worth it. I'm proud of the pose, the composition, the colors, just everything in general. I hope *Merman1234 likes this as much as I liked working on it ^^. (Ya'll like those strategically placed though natural looking limbs don't you!!? No really this pose just happened!)

There's a story behind this I'm sure but since I wasn't given all the details I'll leave it up to everyone's individual interpretation. Something out of a fairytale I imagine it to be though <33.

Time taken: 17 hours
Tools: Paper, pencil, Painter 6 & Photoshop CS2
Someone asked before what I use to ink. 0.3 mm 3H mechanical pencil lead. I stopped digitally inking a year ago ^^.


It'll be a while before I upload again as I'm finishing other commission work. I felt like uploading this simply because it helped me feel like an artist again <3.
